text: hello my name is Aaron solari and I
posted a video of my grandfather singing
to my grandmother in a hospice facility
and it seems to have touched a lot of
people all over the world many people
have the same reaction when they see it
they're moved to tears um they're
overcome I I was moved to tears I was
obviously a little choked up you'll
notice right after my grandmother starts
saying the lyrics to my grandfather the
video sort of shakes a little bit and
that's that's me gaining my composure
and you'll hear my sobs throughout after
the video i was i was so overcome my
broke down in tears and was crying
that's the most beautiful thing I've
ever seen but I I guess I thought it was
because they're my grandparents and I
know them and it's special to me I
didn't take into account of the
universal element in there that would
affect so many more people and I believe
that is love I think that's what's
touching so many people and a lot of
people also ask why would you share such
a private moment firstly I had
permission from my family and we
originally posted it to for friends and
family who couldn't be there to say
their goodbyes but when we saw friends
of friends reacting to it and people who
didn't even know my grandparents just
complete strangers and how much it
touched them we decided to to just let
it be let it go if there's anything the
world needs more of its love and we are
happy to share our amazing grandparents
with you if it's going to bring a little
light and love into your life if there's
one thing that I would like to say it's
that from the bottom of my heart and
from every member of my family we would
like to thank you all for your positive
comments and outpouring of love and and
everyone who bared their soul because it
affected them that greatly you have had
a great effect on us a lasting effect on
us and we hope that whatever positive
impact this video height on you that is
a lasting one as well um so thank you
